query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>'@beginTime@' and est.ENDTIME<'@endTime@' and est.status=1 and est.OPERATEUSERID in (@userByDeptid@) and est.OPERATEUSERID is not null and est.complainttype1 in (@complainttype1@) and est.complainttype2 in (@complainttype2@) and est.complainttype in (@complainttype@) and est.complainttype4 in (@complainttype4@) and est.complainttype5 in (@complainttype5@) and est.complainttype6 in (@complainttype6@) and est.complainttype7 in (@complainttype7@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@) and (est.maindelayflag is null or est.maindelayflag=0)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title,est.complainttype1,est.todeptid, est.senduserid,est.sendtime from est_complaint est where est.ENDTIME>'@beginTime@' and est.ENDTIME<'@endTime@' and est.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est.TODEPTID='@s9@' and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.complainttype2='@s3@' and est.complainttype='@s4@' and est.status=1 and (est.maindelayflag is null or est.maindelayflag=0) and est.complainttype4='@s5@' and est.complainttype5='@s6@' and est.complainttype6='@s7@' and est.complainttype7='@s8@'

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>'@beginTime@' and est.ENDTIME<'@endTime@' and est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE='0' or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and est.OPERATEUSERID in (@userByDeptid@) and est.complainttype1 in (@complainttype1@) and est.complainttype2 in (@complainttype2@) and est.complainttype in (@complainttype@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@) and (est.maindelayflag is null or est.maindelayflag=0) and est.complainttype4 in (@complainttype4@) and est.complainttype5 in (@complainttype5@) and est.complainttype6 in (@complainttype6@) and est.complainttype7 in (@complainttype7@)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title,est.complainttype1,est.todeptid, est.senduserid,est.sendtime from est_complaint est where est.ENDTIME>'@beginTime@' and est.ENDTIME<'@endTime@' and est.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.complainttype2='@s3@' and est.complainttype='@s4@' and est.TODEPTID='@s9@' and est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE='0' or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est.maindelayflag is null or est.maindelayflag=0) and est.complainttype4='@s5@' and est.complainttype5='@s6@' and est.complainttype6='@s7@' and est.complainttype7='@s8@'

query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>'@beginTime@' and est.ENDTIME<'@endTime@' and est.status=1 and est.OPERATEROLEID in (@subroleFromDeptid@) and est.complainttype1 in (@complainttype1@) and est.complainttype2 in (@complainttype2@) and est.complainttype in (@complainttype@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@) and (est.maindelayflag is null or est.maindelayflag=0) and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32 and est.complainttype4 in (@complainttype4@) and est.complainttype5 in (@complainttype5@) and est.complainttype6 in (@complainttype6@) and est.complainttype7 in (@complainttype7@)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title, est.complainttype1,est.todeptid,est.senduserid,est.sendtime from est_complaint est where est.ENDTIME>'@beginTime@' and est.ENDTIME<'@endTime@' and est.OPERATEROLEID='@s1@' and est.OPERATEROLEID is not null and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.complainttype2='@s3@' and est.complainttype='@s4@' and est.TODEPTID='@s9@' and est.status=1 and (est.maindelayflag is null or est.maindelayflag=0) and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32 and est.complainttype4='@s5@' and est.complainttype5='@s6@' and est.complainttype6='@s7@' and est.complainttype7='@s8@'

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>'@beginTime@' and est.ENDTIME<'@endTime@' and est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE='0' or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and est.OPERATEROLEID in (@subroleFromDeptid@) and est.complainttype1 in (@complainttype1@) and est.complainttype2 in (@complainttype2@) and est.complainttype in (@complainttype@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@) and (est.maindelayflag is null or est.maindelayflag=0) and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32 and est.complainttype4 in (@complainttype4@) and est.complainttype5 in (@complainttype5@) and est.complainttype6 in (@complainttype6@) and est.complainttype7 in (@complainttype7@)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title, est.complainttype1,est.todeptid,est.senduserid,est.sendtime from est_complaint est where est.ENDTIME>'@beginTime@' and est.ENDTIME<'@endTime@' and est.OPERATEROLEID='@s1@' and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.complainttype2='@s3@' and est.complainttype='@s4@' and est.TODEPTID='@s9@' and est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE='0' or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est.maindelayflag is null or est.maindelayflag=0) and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32 and est.complainttype4='@s5@' and est.complainttype5='@s6@' and est.complainttype6='@s7@' and est.complainttype7='@s8@'
